00016 //---------------------------------------------------------
00017 //   SelState
00018 //---------------------------------------------------------
00019 
00020 enum SelState {
00021       SEL_NONE,         // nothing is selected
00022       SEL_SINGLE,       // a single object is selected
00023       SEL_MULT,         // more than one object is selected
00024       SEL_STAFF,        // a range in one or more staffs is selected
00025       SEL_SYSTEM        // a system range ("passage") is selected
00026       };
00027 
00028 class Page;
00029 class System;
00030 class ChordRest;
00031 
00032 //---------------------------------------------------------
00033 //   Selection
00034 //---------------------------------------------------------
00035 
00036 class Selection {
00037       ElementList _el;        // valid when SEL_SINGLE or SEL_MULT
00038 
00039    public:
00040       SelState state;
00041       int tickStart;          // selection start time tick
00042       int tickEnd;            // selection end time tick
00043       int staffStart;         // valid if selState is SEL_STAFF
00044       int staffEnd;           // valid if selState is SEL_STAFF
00045 
00046       ElementList* elements() { return &_el; }
00047       void add(Element*);
00048       void add(ElementList& ns);
00049       QRectF deselectAll(Score*);
00050       void remove(Element*);
00051       void clear();
00052       Element* element() const;
00053       ChordRest* firstChordRest() const;
00054       ChordRest* lastChordRest() const;
00055       void update();
00056       void updateState();
00057       void dump();
00058       };
